data.name: Filthy Animals | Heist Simulator
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST NOW


About the Game

Listen up ya Filthy Animals, you work for me now and I got a job for ya. You might be thinking it’s just an ordinary heist - get in, get out with the cash, and hopefully stay in one piece. Well, I got a newsflash for ya, numbnuts - this ain’t no ordinary heist; the vault is on the upper levels, the security system uses lasers, the guards have shotguns, you’re gonna have to escape via helicopter, and to top it all off, you’re a bunch of mutant morons who barely know how to walk.

But them’s the breaks, right? Get in there and put those new bodies I gave ya to good use and get me my money. This could be the start of something great, and if not, well, there are plenty more animals in the sewer.

Filthy Animals is a chaotic multiplayer heist game for 1-4 players. Take on the role of mutant animals following the orders of Tony, the criminal mastermind of the operation. Bumble through a series of heists starting with a convenience store and a bank, gradually unlocking more challenging robberies.


A heist is easier with a well-organised crew who know what they are doing, but I’m sure the four of you numbnuts can handle it. And if you feel smart enough after graduating from big dumb bank robbing mutant college, you can even try your luck and take on the heists alone.


I have big plans! Do things right and you have a bright future ahead of ya. Robbing a store and a bank is child's play; get that done and there are plenty of other targets like tombs, nuclear power plants, space stations… y’know if it ain’t nailed down it’s asking to be taken!


No one said this was going to be easy! Armed guards and security personnel will try to stop you at every turn. And if that wasn’t bad enough, the have-a-go-heroes of this city may even throw some punches your way.


You never know what you’ll find laying around that can help. I suggest roughing up some vending machines - those sodas pack a punch! They can get ya back on your feet, make you super tough, and some other cool tricks too. Also, remember you all got your own mutant animal powers too - so use them!

If one of you goes down, help get them back on their feet. If you don’t get them up in time just flush ‘em down the toilet and I’ll fix them up in the lab.


Be smart! If you come across an obstacle, use the grey matter between ya thick skulls to find the right tool for the job. But for the guards, a good old shotgun might be the answer!


Use the cash you earn to pick up some useful items or some firepower from the Loot-O-Matic for your next job. Or, just pick what looks cool, what do I care?

Just don’t screw this up!

data.short_description: Filthy Animals is a chaotic multiplayer heist game for 1-4 players. Take the role of mutant animals following orders from Tony, the criminal mastermind of the operation. Bumble through heists, use mutant powers and what’s around you as you try to avoid guards and security… It's never easy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 3.4ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
